text: Chayime bhikkhave viññāṇakāyā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ ghānaviññāṇaṃ jivhāviññāṇaṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ
edit: Chayime bhikkhave viññāṇakāyā – cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ ghānaviññāṇaṃ jivhāviññāṇaṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ

translations.transtext: Monks, [they are] these six groups of consciousness: consciousness of eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body, [and] mind.
